unit.name: Tyrannocyte
unit.notes: May transport a formation that consist exclusively of the following types of units: Termaganten, Hormaganten, Venatoren, Biovoren, any type of Carnifex, Schwarmtyrant, Schwarmherrscher, Schwarmoberhaupt (Dagon), Tyranidenkrieger, Zoanthrope. No Shrikes of any type may be taken. After the Tyrannocyte lands, it attacks all enemy Einheiten innerhalb von 15cm. Jeweils enemy formation attacked receives a BM für coming under fire und an extra BM pro casualty. Then transported Verbände set up within 5cm of the point the Tyrannocyte landed oder within 5cm of another already disembarqued unit from the same formation (but a maximum of 15cm from the point where the Tyrannocyte landed).

unit.name: Klingenbestien Biokreuzer
unit.notes: May transport zwei Mycetic Spores including cargo.

unit.name: Schwarmschiff
specialRules: Slow to Arrive (May only arrive from turn 2 onwards), Transport
unit.notes: Darf drei Mycetic Spores including cargo.
